1.content: What story do you choise???
1.title: The Choice

11.content: Which family call Danny to work that weekend?
11.title: Danny/babysitter

choices: Actually, Andy feels a bit gassy...(burp torture)
111.content:
You arrive on time at the house of the two boys you will babysit. The family explains some rules and things to you, and then leaves, leaving you alone with the two kids. Before you could even say a word, you suddenly black out.

When you wake up, you notice that your field of view is vastly different, and then, you realize: you've been shrunk!

Suddenly, a hand reaches down, casting a shadow over you, and picks you up before you can run!

"Hi," The oldest boy, Andy, started, "I'm Andy, and that's Dominic. We just want someone to play with, but if you don't do exactly what we say, you're going to end up...in one of our hungry bellies!!" Andy pats his stomach tauntingly. "Got it?"

You don't give an instant answer.

"Well?!"
111.title: Family of Kathy

choices: Dominic wants Andy to eat you
Dominic is hungry and Andy feeds you to him
Dominic is hungry but Andy eats you anyway
1111.content:
"No!" You yell. "This is ridiculous, now return me to normal size immediately!" Unfortunately you still think you have any power over the kids.

"Dominic, he said no. What should we do?" Andy brings in his brother.

"Eat him! Eat him!" Dominic shouts.

"Well, I am kinda hungry...are you hungry too?" Andy teases.
1111.title: Don't got it.

choices: This is only the beginning...and there's a chance for escape
11111.content:
"No, you eat him! You eat him!" Dominic responds.

"Okay, whatever you say." Andy looks back at you, with an evil grin.

No. No. This kid won't actually eat you, he's just playing...right?

Andy lifts you up and dangles you over his gaping mouth. You can feel his hot breath on your feet.

"Last chance, snack." Andy refers to you.

"You better put me down right now." Is all you say.

"Ha ha, okay!" Andy drops you into his mouth.

Now you're terrified. This little boy is going to eat you.

He swallows you whole, like a pill, and you slide down his saliva-coated tongue into his throat, then drop into his empty stomach. It gurgles happily, as it has noticed the new food: you.

"Yay! Yay!" Dominic cheers. Andy takes a bow.

"We can do whatever we want!" He then yells, grabbing the junk food dish from the counter. Normally, he can only have one piece of candy, and only after dinner, but now, he and Dominic tear through the whole thing. Wrapper after wrapper piles on the table, and the brothers chew loudly with their mouths open, showing the world the candy mush being pulverized in their mouths and sent into their stomachs.

You notice this as well. First it was just some candy mush. Then, it became a lake of the stuff, at the bottom of Andy's stomach. And then, amazingly, the lake doubled. This kid was eating way too much, you thought. But obviously, Andy did not share your views.

After ten minutes or so, the dish was empty, and the brothers lay outstretched on the couch, their feet on the table next to their respective wrapper piles, and their shirts lifted up as they patted and rubbed their bulging stomachs, with big smiles on their faces.

Andy's stomach groans loudly, and then, the six year old lets out a nice belch, followed by a smaller one from Dominic.
11111.title: Dominic wants Andy to eat you

choices: He burps or pukes and you escape!
111112.content:
As you stood in the swamp of candy mush, surrounded by a musk of humid, rancid air, you started to notice that the acids burning away at the sweet treats did not affect you in as nearly a deadly way. You have time to make it back out of this hell! You watch bubbles rise into the air, and the sphincter at the top of the stomach open and close, sucking out excess air, which Andy promptly releases as loud, boyish burps. This gives you an idea.

When Andy and Dominic fall asleep, you begin pounding on Andy's stomach walls, as they gurgle and slosh around, digesting the candy. Hopefully the ruckus will cause him to wake up and expel you somehow.
111112.title: This is only the beginning...and there's a ...

1111121.title: He burps or pukes and you escape!

1111122.content:
Andy's stomach rumbles really loudly, shaking you from your efforts. In his sleep, Andy releases another belch, and you realize that's all your doing, creating more burps.

You stand helpless in the lake of acid, as moans sound all around you. After an hour or so, you are still not digested, not even a little. Are you immune somehow? Regardless, Andy wakes up.

"*Yaaaawn* Ahh, let's see..." Andy walks over and grabs a soda from the fridge, "Mom would never let me drink this at night, but I'm thirsty and it's delicious!" Andy guzzles down the fizzy drink faster than anything, finishing half the small bottle off in one sip.

Woosh! You are pushed around as waves upon waves of soda crash into the boy's tummy. Well great, now you can't stand, you have to wade. What extra work.

*BUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRPPPPPPPPP* *URRRP* "Haha, much better." Andy finishes the soda and goes to his room, leaving Dominic on the couch asleep.

*EHHHHHHHRRRRRRRRRPPPP* "Hehe, 'scuse me." Andy says half-heartedly. He sits down to play video games. What's a late night without staying up?

You have another chance. Are you lifted out by these burps?
1111122.title: It's not effective...

11112.content:
"Oooh, yeah! I wanna eat him!" Dominic decides excitedly.

"Okay. Catch him out of the air!" Andy complies, and you are sent into a freefall, as the six-year-old drops you over his brother's gaping mouth.

You fall right in, the four-year-old catching you effortlessly. He savors your taste, swishing you around. When you're nice and drenched in his saliva, he swallows you whole, and you enter Dominic's stomach. You can see the remains of a snack floating around in a small pool of stomach acid, and it disgusts you.

Suddenly, a rush of air escapes and Dominic lets out a loud belch, right in Andy's face. The two crack up at it, and decide to have a burping contest!

Andy runs into the kitchen and grabs two bottles of soda, one for each of them, and they begin to drink. You are drowned by the rush of soda into the boy's belly, as his stomach rumbles as it is filled with cola.

Dominic puts down his soda first, with about half of it left. Feeling the pressure build up, he releases a particularly deep, but short burp.

Andy manages to chug a bit more, and places his soda down, as he lets out a mighty 5-second belch. The boy pats his gassy tummy afterward, proud of his accomplishment.

The boys then proceed to drink the rest of their beverages. Andy finishes first, and lets out a smaller burp than before, but it's still a big one. Dominic goes rapid fire, releasing a barrage of small belches. They don't even care who won at this point, as they just enjoyed being able to burp as much as they want, without being yelled at by anyone for once.

At this point, you are surprised you survived that flood of soda and all of those burps!

What happens next?
11112.title: Dominic is hungry and Andy feeds you to him

111121.content:
"I'm hungry." Andy said, his belly growling. He then remebered that Mom made a huge batch of cookies yesterday, and went into the kitchen to get them. His mouth watering, Andy snatched one off the plate and stuffed the whole thing in his mouth. He chewed it up loudly and swallowed it happily, grabbing another.

"Ooh! Cookies! That'll go great with the guy I just ate!" Dominic takes a cookie and downs it in two bites. The sweet, sugary mush coats you, as you've just about given up and lay down to accept your fate.

The brothers continue to devour cookies until all that's left on the plate are a few crumbs. Andy's stomach bulges outward in its fullness and touches Dominic's own engorged belly. The room is full of the sounds of boys' stomachs digesting food. Andy burps really loudly, right in Dominic's face. Dominic can smell the sweet cookies in his brother's belch, and lets loose his own burp. The two can feel each other's stomachs rumbling, and release more loud, smelly burps.

After that, Andy and Dominic drift off to sleep on the couch, the smooth, rounded surfaces of their bellies showing after their shirts rode up from a good rubbing. The sounds of digestion are dying down....
111121.title: Andy and Dominic eat more

choices: Wait until he goes to the bathroom
1111211.content:
If by some miracle, you were still alive in the young 4 year olds stomach. You were very happy and wanted to celebrate within the stomach but a force starts to suck you downwards in to Dominic's intestines. It is then that reality hits you and you remember that your in the digestive system and it all leads to one exit.

Dominic goes and lays down in his bed as he farts as he gets settled. Andy looked to Dominic and said, "eww Dom! That's what Danny is going to be tomorrow!" Dominic giggles and says, "yep he's gonna be my poop!" Then he looked at Andy and asked, "what if he survives??". Andy pondered for a bit and then replied, "he won't. He's nothing but food and if he does we should torture him with our butts!!" Dominic giggles with glee by his brothers suggestion, "yes let's do that but now for bed". The two boys fell right asleep.

Meanwhile, you were in a living hell. The mush of food is further being digested by the small intestine and then being absorbed. The remaining particles and you were pushed into the Dominic's large intestine. The smell was absolutely awful. You had babysat the kids before and Dominic's farts were stinky but you never imagined how much worse it was on the inside. You land in the poop filled rectum and you debate rather to escape now or wait for Dominic to poop you out. If you escaped now you'd have to crawl through lots of poop but if you waited you had no idea if he'd see you or what he had planned if you lived. You decide to...
1111211.title: You're alive

choices: Dominic makes his way to the bathroom
1111212.content:
Dominic, the cute four year old sleeps soundly his belly churning you mercilessly. You scream in terror and pain as the acidic mush slowly melting around you starts itching, and then burning your tender skin. There is no way out of this!!!! If only you had listened to the boys - played along, but no - you tried to put them in their place - now they've put you in your place, the digesting stomach of a 4 year old boy. You shudder in horror as you realize what's in store for you as you slowly pass out. It's not gonna be fair, and it's not gonna be pretty.

Dominic burps once more in his sleep, a boyish smile spreading on his lips as he wakes himself up. He pats his belly one last time, shaking you up. "Goodbye little snack - you sure were yummy!" Dominic lets out a huge stinky belch in his sleeping brother's face - the smells of your digesting meat rising out of his throat. Dominic yawns and lies down next to his brother as you pass out.

Kathy comes home later that night - her boys asleep on the floor and you nowhere in sight. She thanks her lucky stars that Andy and Dominic are safe and sound, but she curses your name - "I'll see that little shit never gets a job again for abandoning my boys!" True enough, you're now just sludge nourishing Dominic's intestines. Kathy puts the boys to sleep and Dominic sleeps soundly as he absorbs your carbs, proteins and fats - at least you're helping a growing boy grow...

The next morning
1111212.title: You're dead

11112121.content:
Awakened refreshed as only little kids can be, Dominic stretches and farts, waking his brother up. "Hehe - I gotta poop!" He jokes.

"Gross - get out of here, Dom!" Andy whines trying to go back to sleep.

Dominic shuffles off to the bathroom, taking you with him. From there, you two will be parted forever. Leaving the door open, the little tyke hops up on the toilet and grunts. His bare feet dangle way off the ground - his undies and pajamas perched on his ankles. Curling his toes, Dominic pushes and groans for all he's worth - clenching his guts around the sticky turd that's now emerging from his cute little butt.

Squeaky and crinkly sounding little farts herald your re-emergence into the world - your birth from the boy's posterior. A long, thick rope slowly coils in the cold water before Dominic clenches his hole shut and enjoys the gross sounding PLOP that finishes the deal. "I'M DONE!" he yells. Kathy, downstairs, busy with breakfast yells up to Andy. "ANDY, HONEY - I'M SORRY - YOU'RE GONNA HAVE TO TAKE CARE OF YOUR BROTHER!"

Dominic smiles as his older brother comes in to clean him up. "Uh- gross, Dom - Danny smells nasty now."

"huh?"

"Don't tell me you don't know that you just turned our baby sitter into your smelly brown... no, green poop!" Andy says looking into the bowl.

"hehe - that's gross." Dominic replies. He looks in the bowl as his brother wipes him. "Look, Andy - I can see his bones - that's awesome!" Sure enough, immersed in the steamy dark green and brown log, your lifeless skull smiles up at the cute little boy who had you for a snack. "Bye bye, Danny - have fun being my poop!"

Andy rolls his eyes and gags as he finishes wiping his brother. With a flush you're whisked away and the boys head downstairs for some real food.
11112121.title: Dominic makes his way to the bathroom

11113.content:
Urged on by Dominic's cheers Andy lift you up to his mouth and dangles you above his outstretched tongue, beyond in the darkness his uvula glistens forcing you to cry out and scream, "Please I'll let you guys eat what ever and stay up as late as you want!"

Andy considers for a moment and then releases you from his fingers dropping you into the six year old's mouth. As it snaps shut you are trapped in darkness as his tongue rolls you around gathering saliva and letting him taste you. "MMMM he tastes kind of good!" Andy proclaims as Dominic begins to urge him to swallow. With a shrug Andy swallows with ease and opens his mouth to his brother who cheers at the empty cavern.

For you it is pure terror as Andy's tongue pushes you back and down his throat in a rush of squeezing muscles forcing you down until reaching the boy's stomach.
11113.title: Dominic is hungry but Andy eats you anyway

111131.content:
You plop into a giant empty cavern. Deep, menacing growls and moans echo all around, as the boy's stomach receives it's new snack. That's be you, by the way. Immediately, in a desperate fear, you run around screaming, pounding on the young boy's stomach walls, begging to be released from this wet, humid prison of death.

Outside, Dominic puts his head against Andy's belly. Andy, being a tall kid for his age, had a bigger, but still relatively flat tummy, giving Dominic's head plently of room. He could clearly hear your screams, and started giggling.

"He's so scared in there! Ha ha ha!" Andy laughs along, enjoying your torture. As Dominic moves out of the way, Andy rubs his belly, tingling with your frightened antics.

"Hey, Dominic," Andy called, "Listen!" A quiet, deep, rumble-y noise rose from Andy's throat, a warning siren to the loud belch that quickly followed. It was deep and full-sounding, a pleasing sound to the two boys, and petrifying to you. His burp took out half the air trapped in his stomach from swallowing you.

"I'm hungry!" Dominic yelled, running to the kitchen and grabbing a doughnut. He was starving, so he spoke in between greedily scarfing it down, "yu wanth won?"

"Yeah!" Andy replied, catching the doughnut that Dominic tossed.

Andy ate as Dominic let out his own burp. It couldn't hold a candle to his brother's impressive ones, but it still made him giggle.

At this point, Andy's stomach started to digest you. The boys could barely hear your guttural cries of sheer pain above their own chewing and talking. In a few minutes, you would be nothing but--!

As if to add insult to injury, doughnut mush began to pile on you, and Andy burped loudly again, patting his full, gurgling tummy.

"Ahh, I think that little guy is probably dead now." He said with a giggle. Ironically, you heard that, even though you were about to die anyway.

"Cool!" Dominic replied.

"The house is ours!" The brothers agreed.
111131.title: Digested

1112.content: Let's play hide and seek. "We will leave Andy's bedroom while you hide" said Dominic. They start running out of the room. You being shrunken begin to fall of the bed. You land on the floor right next to Andy's skate shoes. You climb up the giant shoelace and jump inside of the shoe. You hear Andy call out "where is he?". Dominic replies "let's look outside since he could fit under the door." Andy replies "sure! Just let me get my shoes on first." Suddenly you fall backwards towards the toe section of the shoe and see Andy slip his barefoot into the shoe. You are flung up and down inside the shoe as you are now shrinking. You realize that your shrinking due to the size of Andy's foot. You work out that you must be 1/10th of an inch when Andy's foot stops getting bigger. You see his foot flop about in the shoe, indicating he forgot to tie his shoes after putting them on. You are worried that at your small stature you would easily be flung out of the shoe so you wedge yourself between Andy's big toe and second toe. You hear andy say that he was getting bored with trying to find you and he goes back inside with Dominic. Andy takes off his shoes. You are still stuck between Andy's big and second toe. He and Dominic decide to invite some friends over. They ring up Cody, Austin and Owen. Not long after the 3 friends arrive. They take their shoes off. Cody was wearing a pair of flip flops, Austin was wearing skate shoes and Owen was also wearing skate shoes. Andy wants to play a game with them, but as soon as Andy takes a step you are dislodged from between his big and second toe. His foot misses you as he puts his foot down. You think to yourself "damn he was my only source of help!" Suddenly you realize what game Andy, Dominic, Cody, Austin and Owen were playing. It was:
1112.title: Okay! Let's play a game!

11121.content: You hear the 5 kids playing tag, inside the house. Suddenly Cody sticky foot came down on top of you. You are stuck too his foot. Luckily every step he made doesn't harm you. You are lossened by gravity and fall to the ground, only to get stuck between Austin's big toe and second toe. Andy feels tired, do they stop playing?
11121.title: tag

111211.content: Andy decides to stop playing. The other four soon follow and stop playing. You are still stuck between Austins toes but start shrinking to 1/16th of an inch. You slip out from between the toes and run to hides in Owens socks that were in his shoes. Suddenly Owen starts putting on his socks and you were trapped. He puts on his shoes as he goes home. You were stuck between his toes and the fabric of the sock. You soon shrink again to 1/32th of an inch and fall out of the holes in the socks fabric. Owen feels something in his shoe and takes off the shoe. You fall out of the shoe. Owen walks off. You hear this flop, flop, flop sound booming near you. You look up and see it was Cody. You jump and land on Cody's big toe. You grab the hair of his big toe so you didn't fall off on your bumpy ride to Cody's house. Flop, flop, flop boomed with each step Cody took. You finally reach Cody's house and you go flying as he takes off his flip flops. Where do you land?
111211.title: yes

1112112.content:
You fall on top of Cody's shirt, but you're so tiny that you fall through the threads (it's kind of an old, worn-out shirt) and land right on to the warm skin of Cody's belly. It growls and groans, rising up and down with his breathing. Cody, laying down, takes a piece of candy he left on his beside table and gobbles it up. You feel it enter his stomach, beginning to slosh around in digestion. Cody burps, sending some crumbs up and out of his mouth. You felt the deep vibration of his belch.

What now?
1112112.title: on top of his shirt

111212.content: They don't stop playing. You are soon lodged between Austin's toes for what seems like hours until you go flying through the air from austin running and land directly on the floor, you are not hurt. You decide to run away from them and rest on Cody's flip flops. Suddenly you see Cody's foot coming on top of you. You are knocked out by the smell and wake up at Cody's friend, Dylan's house. Dylan was a little bit of a brat to you, but being titanic to you, he was a mega brat. Where at his house are you?
111212.title: no

1112121.content: You realize you are in Dylan's bedroom. You hear boom boom boom as he approaches the door. You jump in the nearest thing you could find to hide in. You feel you world tip and you hit something squishy, you realize you were in his shoe. You see his foot enter his shoe. He was off to school. Boom boom boom echoed with each step. You look at Dylan's foot and see he isn't wearing any socks. You curl up next to his big toe and fall asleep.
1112121.title: bed room

11121212.content: Dylan had gym first up, so he got changed. You fell out of his shoe and onto the floor of the change room. You overhear dylan saying that the class was doing swimming and you realize that he was in a boy only gym class. You jump onto his leg and hold onto his leg hair. You fly off the hair as he walks past this kid named jayden. You fall in his shoe as he was putting them in his locker. About 20 - 40 mins later, jayden opened the bag and put his shoes on. You saw no socks on his feet either this time.you suddenly shrunk to 1/20th of an inch and could sit on jayden's big toenail.you suddenly hear a conversation between the gym teacher and jayden about why he was not wearing any socks. After the conversation ended jayden took his foot out of the shoe and you held on while his foot was raising. Suddenly you see him put socks on, you were trapped. jayden slipped the sock on without seeing you hanging from his big toenail. What does he have next?
11121212.title: you remain shrunk

113.content:
Because you arrive late to the house of the two kids you have been asked to babysit, the parents rush out in an annoyed hurry and don't say much to you. Almost as if in a flash, you are standing with two cute little boys, and there is an awkward silence. Suddenly, you pass out, for reasons unknown to you.

As you come to your senses a while afterward, you notice that you're next to a giant foot, attached to a giant leg, and, way, way up there, a giant body...oh no! You've been shrunk to the size of an ant!

"Hee hee! Look, Peter, he's sooo tiny!" You hear the older one point you out, he's the one standing over you. "We can do whatever we want, and with this new toy too!"

That conclusion frightens you. So, what do they do?
113.title: Cindy and Vince

choices: You aren't affected by stomach acid and stay alive
1131.content:
Jake picks you up in his right hand, which wouldn't normally be a giant constricting mechanism capable of a deathly strong grip, if of course you were normal sized. But you aren't.

He holds you close to his face, and you can feel his breath. It is warm, and smells sweet; likely some candy or a sugary drink passed those lips a while ago. As he looks at you, with big, curious eyes, his stomach growls, and he suddenly remembers:

"Oh yeah! My snack! Hey, new toy, want to join me?"

Jake carries you over to the table in the living room, where he has a plate with a lot of crumbs, and a couple crackers with peanut butter spread on top. The boy sits down and places you on the plate.

"Ooh, my favorite show!" Jake calls your attention to the television, which you just realized was on. Some cartoon nonsense was on, but it was obviously enjoyable for the young boy, so you were extremely grateful for the distraction.

At least, then, you were.

As you stood on the plate, contemplating your next move to escape and hopefully figure all this out, Jake's gigantic hand picks you up along with a cracker you were next to, and you land on your back in peanut butter. Oh no! The gooey substance holds you down, and you are forced to watch yourself be lifted up, towards Jake's gaping mouth, and placed inside. He was so entranced by the TV that he forgot about you!

You quickly roll off (the saliva made it easier to move) the cracker to avoid being crushed by the boy's teeth as he loudly chewed up the cracker. You are taunted by the light coming in as Jake chews with his mouth open...if only he chewed slower! Then maybe you could escape. But it was too late. You and the masticated cracker mush slid to the back of his throat, and with a loud gulp, are pushed down, into a one-way trip to the seven-year-old's stomach.
1131.title: Jake is hungry

choices: He wakes up in the middle of the night, hungry
His parents come home to find their kids alone
11311.content:
You land with a plop inside the stomach of the boy. It smells like peanut butter and that sweet smell from his breath, mixed with the foul stomach acid. You scamper back along the surface of the fleshy cavern, avoiding the slope into the pool of acid, as the last chewed-up cracker enters.

Outside, Jake's belly groans and rumbles, beginning to digest the snack. He sighs, lays back on the couch, and takes a sip of juice from his juice box nearby. The sugary liquid foils your plan for survival, washing you into the acid pool. Instantly, it burns, so much so that you pass out from the pain, never to wake up, your life quickly ended by the digestive process of a little boy.

Jake finishes his juice, and rubs his gurgly tummy, and feels a pressure in his chest. He smiles and then burps really loudly, a deep, satisfying, boyish belch, coming from the gassy pit of his stomach, where your half-digested body lies. He then begins to drift off to sleep on the couch, comforted by the sounds of his belly.
11311.title: Jake's Belly

113111.content: Jake wakes up at about 11 at night, a bit before his parents are to come home. He notices that Peter is soundly asleep on the floor, and then, Jake's belly lets out a tremendous growl, as his stomach is completely empty. So, to remedy this, Jake goes into the kitchen, and gets himself two huge cookies and a tall glass of milk. *CHOMP* In three bites, the first cookie is downed into his tummy. Then, he loudly chews up the other just as quickly, sending it down with a loud gulp of milk. Jake finishes that first glass and chugs down a second. His belly now sticks out under his shirt, making weird, loud digestive noises. The boy pats and scratches his belly's rounded form, and feels gas building up inside. Suddenly, Jake lets out a giant belch, then three boyish small ones. Well, he's full now! Jake goes back to the couch and lays back down, burping several more times. Jake is comforted by his belches, and swallows air to force them out. He falls asleep, but his stomach continues to busily and loudly digest his late night snack. Jake lets out a cute, short burp in his sleep.
113111.title: He wakes up in the middle of the night, hungry

1131112.content:
Cindy and Vince stalk quietly into the house seeing all the lights off. They notice Jake asleep on the couch, his bare belly held lightly in his hands. Peter is on the floor by his brother. Cursing under their breath that you had been irrespsonsible enough to let them sleep wherever, the search the house for you. Why on earth wouldn't you have been in the living room waiting for them?

Once their search turns up fruitless, they panic for a second - you had left their babies alone and left!? They angrily send you a text, noticing your phone on the end table. Cindy smiles grimly thinking she'll give you quite an earful when you come back to pick it up tomorrow. In the meantime, the couple carry their boys to bed as they still sleep, unknowingly carrying you in Jake's tummy. As she tucks him in, smiling and rubbing his gurgling gut, you're squirted in liquid form into his intestines for absorbtion and a very humiliating color change.

The next morning, Jake wakes up to a pressure in his gut. He plods off to the bathroom and locks himself inside, turning on the fan. He plants his butt on the toilet seat and sighs as he lets out a tremendous fart. Giggling, he pees and then leaves the bathroom for a light breakfast. You're still coursing through his bowels.

Eventually, time catches up. Your phone blows up all day from your roommates and friends. Cindy is perplexed, if only marginally worried. Apparently you went on a bender last night, she thinks. Well, no, you just went on a disgusting ride through her 7 year old son, who's about to poop you out. As Cindy attends Peter, playing in the bathtub, Jake walks in and alerts his mom to the growing need in his guts. "She looks at Peter, who's nowhere near done with his bath, and then at Jake who clearly doesn't want her around.

"Alright," she concedes and leaves the bathroom with the two brothers. Peter is in the tub watching his brother who drops his pants and plants his bum on the toilet seat. "Hey, Pete." he says grunting as he swings his feet and wiggles his toes. "I wonder where Danny went last night. Mom seemed really angry that he left. He didn't even tell me where he went after I had my snack." He feels his butthole crinkle open and a long slimy log start to descend.

"I wanna see him again." Peter announces as Jake pinches off the turd to a wet plop sound.

"Yeah, me too, but I don't think Mom's gonna pick him again." Jake replies getting a handful of toilet paper.

Peter stands up in the bath and leans over. "No - I wanna see him now, Jake. He's in there." Peter points to the toilet.

"What are you talking about?" Jake says as he rocks to one side wiping the brown smudges off his little puckering hole. "That's not very nice, Peter, to name my poop after our babysitter - even if he did run away."

"No - Jake - he IS your poop. I watched you eat him last night when you were watching TV." Peter giggles childishly and Jake freezes, shocked the crumpled paper in hand, smeared with the nasty crap you've become. He stares at it in horror.

Peter continues to giggle as he sings, "You turned Danny into Poopie! You turned Danny into Poopie!"

Jake hops off the toilet and looks in horror at the mess he's made. Peter joins him by his side. "Look at all those bones." "Eww gross, he's so stinky now." Peter laughs hysterically, and Jake concedes smiling at the humor of it. "Oops - my bad, Danny. I guess I should have been more careful. You do make a nice turd, though." He says chuckling as he tosses in the paper and pulls the handle.
1131112.title: Parents return and shenanigans the next day

choices: You flow with the cookies into the next stage of digestion
11312.content:
In the lake of mushed crackers and stomach acid, you realize that you cannot be digested!

Jake eats every last cracker on his plate, and lifts his shirt up, revealing his loud, gurgling, bare stomach. It bulges slightly, half-full. He rubs and pats it contentedly. Pacing his hand over his innie belly button, he burps, *UUUUUUUUUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRRRPPP*, a huge, satisfying belch.

"Ahh...excuse me." He says sarcastically.

Later in the night, you've fallen asleep, careful to pick out a reliable, drier spot, as you plan to figure out an escape in the morning. Jake, however, decides that, since his parents aren't home, he wants to eat cookies before dinner. Grabbing the whole plate of 12 and taking it into his room Jake gobbles up sweet after sweet, not falling asleep until the plate was clean.

He's gotten a bit ahead of himself. Now, his stomach is bulging out noticeably, stretched by the influx of cookie mush. He moans just as his tummy moans, falling asleep to its loud, obnoxious gurgles.

*BBUUUURRRRPPPP* *UUURRP* Jake lets out two deep belches, which smell really sweet, like the cookies he just ate.

131.content:
You had dreamed of this moment for years.

Every time you fell victim to an injustice, every time you went to a new place or saw an opportunity that would be fun to exploit if you were at a different magnitude, you dreamed of being bigger. You dreamed of raining chaos upon tiny humans, and obliterating their towns. Those dreams were coming true.

You found a strange statue in the forest while you were exploring. When you touched it, you blacked out- and when you regained consciousness, lying on the forest floor, you realized you had transformed into something better, something bigger... a Giant. When you awoke, you were at least 50 times your original size, and you were towering above the forest and the nearby town.

You smiled as you approached the small, remote city. This would be fun.
131.title: Chandler, a boy of 5 years old

You see the tallest building in the town and charge for it, you run straight through it smashing it and crushing hundreds of people beneath your massive feet. You see a group of people running away from you until they are scooped backwards to stop their running. Then you turn around and sit on them, crushing all of them beneath the full weight of your blue briefs and your butt cheeks. They will forever lay there unrecocnizeable and squished. What do you do next?

13112.content:
You hear your stomach give off a desperate loud growl, hungry for food. Lots of food. As a pack of about 30 people started to run away, you bend down and scoop them up into your palm. Before they even have a chance to jump, you bring your hand to your mouth and drop all of them in at once. Savoring the new and satisfying taste, you chew some of them up and swallow them all down. You giggle as you feel all the bodies fall into your massive stomach. It growls loudly again. Those people didn't even put a dent in your hunger.

You rampage through the city, and scoop up more people quicker and in higher numbers than your first batch of tasty citizens. You come to love their pitiful screams as they fall into your mouth and are digested by your stomach. After about a binge of over 1000 people, you sit down on one of the roads, relax, and pat your distended belly. Screams of countless people can be heard, although muffled, from within. Then, you feel a low, shaky rumble from inside your stomach. Something was coming...

BUUUUUUURP!! You release a massive belch, knocking over the building across from you with the sound. You turn away at the smell of your gas, and burp again, this time shorter but deeper. It shakes the ground like a small earthquake, as does your belly's continued grumbling as it digests all the people eaten.

What now?
13112.title: A Feast Fit For A Giant Boy

"Eww!" You squeal in your 5-year-old voice.

You take a look at your foot and realize it was a little deer. Taking your hand, you scrape the bloody remains off and watch as they splat back down in the forest. You shrug it off and continue walking, before you find the residential area near your house again, you had already squished another deer and some other young boy about your age who was just out exploring. Except you crushed him on purpose. He had started to scream and run from you, but you only grinned and mushed him flat down on a tree stump he tripped over. You didn't even consider his life for another second before you sole had settled down upon his tiny figure, you would have hated for him to find the thing you touched. You rampage alone.

Once you were out in the city where your school was, your soles had become a bloody mess, along with your fingers, lips, and back of your pants. This was fun!

School had started, and you were ready to do this. Payback time, bitches! An evil, boyish grin comes to your face. You start by...

1313311.content:
Wondering what these children tasted like, you tilted your head back and effortlessly dropped them all into your awaiting maw. A couple unfortunates missed your mouth entirely when you were dropping them in, and they plummeted to their death.

You slosh them around inside your mouth for a minute or two, trying to get a good taste of them... it wasn't working, so, you chomped down on their tiny little bodies. You felt each one pop inside your maw as you munched and crunched them up with your huge teeth.

Delicious!

You wanted more of these little people to snack upon, so you begin the walk down the tiny little street in search of some more children to feast on.

Everyone in this van seems to be under 14 years of age, so they should taste great. It seems the only adult in the car is the driver. You approach the van and put one of your massive legs on each side. And fortunately for you, this van was completely stuck! You bend down and pick it up; tearing the roof off, you deposit all the kids and their father into your palm. You stand back up to your enormous height.

"Hmmm... I don't eat the big ones." You say, picking up the father and bringing him to your face.

He begins to speak, "Please! Take me and let my children go! Please! Have mercy!"

You smile at him before letting him drop to his death. He splatters on the ground near your foot. You turn your attention back to your delicious little captives. Raising two of them up in your other hand, they scream when you drop them into your mouth. Bringing your giant teeth down upon them, the crunch moistly in your mouth before you swallow.

"Mmmm... you guys are better than the last!" You say, gleefully.

13133121.content:
You giggle as a thought springs to your mind. You loved stuffing things into your undies, and often used to practice on your pets. You just loved the feeling of something trapped in your undies, pressed against your big butt- and you loved it even more when they accidentally get squeezed in-between your cheeks. You always wanted to stuff a bunch of kids into the back of your undies, and you now saw your chance.

"I know a place I think you guys might like." You giggled, bringing them to your backside, "Namely, my undies!" Before you could react, you pulled open the back of your pants and underwear a bit, and slipped them into the gap. Once most of them were inside, you let the opening slam shut, trapping them inside. Some of them were crushed almost immediately, but you could feel most of them continue to squirm against your butt.

You giggled at the sensation as some of them got stuck between your cheeks. You could feel them desperately squirm, but their struggles only sent them sliding deeper into your crack. You shifted a bit, guiding them on their path. You were in great anticipation- they were just about to reach your favorite part. 

You let out a sharp moan as you felt one of the older ones get shoved halfway into your butt hole. You had always loved that feeling, but it was a rare one. The kid's struggles intensified as it slid inside, which only served to pleasure you more, as well as pulling him further in. He finally disappeared inside the hole, and his struggles lasted for only a few seconds before he met his fate. Oh well- there was plenty more where that came from.

One by one, they disappeared into  the hole, each one feeling better then the last.  Finally, most all of them had been enveloped, and the ones that hadn't been were promptly crushed between his titanic cheeks as he squeezed them together.

Now that had been fun.

Many new and exciting opportunities crossed your mind as you contemplated the recent events. It had been just the start to a new adventure- due to his simple gain in size, every fantasy he's ever had could now be easily accomplished, and all the power in the world was at his fingertips. All you had to do was figure out what to do first.

info.brief_description: What happen when you are smaller than a hungry kid?
info.description:
You can choose three storyline:
1) You are Danny, a 25 yo boy and you study at university. You also work as babysitter in four different families...
The first composed by the mum Kathy and two kids: Andy 6 yo and Dominic 4 yo
The second is composed by the mum Sandra, the dad Paul and three kids: Erik 9 yo, Noah 10 yo and Amy 4 yo
Then there is the third family composed bt mum Cindy, dad Vince and two sons: Jake 7 yo and Peter 4 yo.
And last one is composed by mum Kira and four sons: the twins Miki and Fred 5 yo, Josh 8 yo and Amanda 9 yo.

2) You are a couple, Jasmine and Tony with two sons: Greg 5 yo and Jack 2 1/2 yo

3)You can choise between three giant kids who destroys cities and vore people.


All is allowed, especially vore, squish, torture and dominance. No Sex
